A complete Hello World example can be found [http://code.google.com/p/jo-widgets/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fhelloworld here]

#Hello World example 
{{{
package org.jowidgets.examples.common;

import org.jowidgets.api.toolkit.Toolkit;
import org.jowidgets.common.application.IApplication;
import org.jowidgets.common.application.IApplicationLifecycle;
import org.jowidgets.common.widgets.controler.impl.WindowAdapter;
import org.jowidgets.tools.powo.JoFrame;

public class HelloWorld implements IApplication {

    @Override
    public void start(final IApplicationLifecycle lifecycle) {

        //create a new (root) frame
        final JoFrame frame = new JoFrame("Hello World");
 
        //add a label to the frame 
        frame.addLabel("Hello World");

        //finish the application on window closing
	frame.addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {
	    @Override
	    public void windowClosed() {
		lifecycle.finish();
	    }
	});

        //set the root frame visible
	frame.setVisible(true);
    }
	
    public static void main(final String[] args) throws Exception {
        //start the application with an application runner
        Toolkit.getApplicationRunner().run(new HelloWorld());
    }

}
}}}
